generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title ExpenseGroup smart contract allows to share and settle a group of expenses and track debts and credits.
 @author Andrs Buenestado
Allow the creation of the first member when the contract instance is created.
A mapping of expense identifier and expense.

@notice Constructor. The creator of the smart contract will be the first member.    
 @param _name the name of the first member.

statements.documentation: NOTE: Expense contains a mapping 'approvals' and data location needs to be storage.
If the number of approvals before the call is not 0, we revert the balance to the previous state without the expense.
If the number of approvals after is not 0, we syncrohonize the balance.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct ExpenseGroup.Payment storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct ExpenseGroup.Payment storage ref[] storage pointer,struct ExpenseGroup.Payment storage ref)

documentation.text: @notice Allow each user to withdraw its money from the smart contract

@notice Get the max of all balances.
 @return (max, index) where max is the max of all the balance and index is the index of the member.

@notice Get withdrawal per address
 @return the available withdrawal for the member address

@notice Calculate the state of the balance after each new payement.
 @param payment which will alter balance

@title ExpenseGroup smart contract allows to share and settle a group of expenses and track debts and credits.
 @author Andrs Buenestado
Allow the creation of the first member when the contract instance is created.
A mapping of expense identifier and expense.

@notice Constructor. The creator of the smart contract will be the first member.    
 @param _name the name of the first member.

statements.documentation: NOTE: Expense contains a mapping 'approvals' and data location needs to be storage.
If the number of approvals before the call is not 0, we revert the balance to the previous state without the expense.
If the number of approvals after is not 0, we syncrohonize the balance.

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct ExpenseGroup.Payment storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct ExpenseGroup.Payment storage ref[] storage pointer,struct ExpenseGroup.Payment storage ref)

documentation.text: @notice Allow each user to withdraw its money from the smart contract

@notice Get the max of all balances.
 @return (max, index) where max is the max of all the balance and index is the index of the member.

@notice Get withdrawal per address
 @return the available withdrawal for the member address

@notice Calculate the state of the balance after each new payement.
 @param payment which will alter balance

devdoc.author: Andrs Buenestado

addExpense(string,uint256,uint256,addres.details: The number of payees are limited to a fixed number to avoid gas limit using loop.

params._amount: the amount of the expense. Must be superior to zero.
params._payees: the list of payee of the expense. The payer can be part of the payees.
params._valueDate: the value date of the expense.

params._name: the name or alias of the member.

params._approved: the approval of the member : true of false.

params._name: the name of the first member.

returns._0: true if payee gave is approval, else false
(max, index) where max is the max of all the balance and index is the index of the member.
the available withdrawal for the member address

devdoc.title: ExpenseGroup smart contract allows to share and settle a group of expenses and track debts and credits.

addExpense(string,uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Add an expense as payer. By default, the payer is the creator of the expense.

addMember(string,address).notice: Adds a member. Only registered member can add new members.

addPayment(string,address).notice: Create a Payment. Use this payable function send money to the smart contract.

approve(uint256,bool).notice: Set member's approval for an expense. Each member has 4 weeks to set its approval.

constructor.notice: Constructor. The creator of the smart contract will be the first member.

getApproval(uint256,address).notice: Get approval depending on the expense identifier and address of the member.

getBalance(address).notice: Get the balance of a member.

getMaxBalance().notice: Get the max of all balances.

getMemberName(address).notice: Get the name of a member.

getNumberOfApprovals(uint256).notice: Get the total number of approvals for a given expense.

isContractInstanceCreated().notice: Allow the creation of the first member when the contract instance is created.

numExpenses().notice: A mapping of expense identifier and expense.

withdraw().notice: Allow each user to withdraw its money from the smart contract
